summary: This is a small pack that adds several followers around the world of Skyrim. Each one has a small story behind them but doesn't have any custom voice-acting (yet, hopefully) and has skills based on their backstory.
descriptionHtml:
Drag and drop into your Skyrim/Data file and make sure to select it in your Mod-manager/Skyrim launcher.

This is a small pack that adds several followers around the world of Skyrim. Each one has a small story behind them but doesn't have any custom voice-acting (yet, hopefully) and has skills based on their backstory. More will be added later.
[quote][color=#6aa84f]-[i][b]Aveline-    [/b][/i][i]A sea-born Breton woman from the shores of western Skyrim who has lived in the badlands of the Nordic home for much of her life. She is willing to follow any adventurer willing to find excitement and grandeur. She currently resides in the Sleeping Giant Inn.[/i][/color][/quote][quote][color=#f1c232]-[i][b]Dravkon Scraine-     [/b]A forest-loving Nord who hunts men as well as game, searching for a valiant companion to travel with. His skill with a bow is matched only by his sense of Nordic honor. He presently spends his time in the Drunken Huntsman swapping stories.[/i][/color][/quote][quote][color=#e69138]-[i][b]Kadifa-    This northern Hammerfell Redguard was once the slave to a powerful necromancer on the sailing island Stros M'Kai. She escaped on a merchant ship and found her way into the frozen ports of in the cold alone and awaits a wanderer willing to bring her blades. She sits like a cactus in the snow on the docks of Windhelm.[/b][/i][/color][/quote][quote][color=#ff0000]-Aquila Cornelius-    A faithful son of the Empire, Cornelius has served his service-term with the Imperial Legion and is taking a long leave until his next service. As a firm believer in the traditional number of Divines, he has worn his Amulet of Talos since a young age. He now sits and takes in the sermons of Talos as given by Heimskr in the Sky-District of Whiterun.[/color][/quote]
author: Deputy Dropshot
